body:
Hi everyone.



I'm studying gridbase simulation using example data ([http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&amp...;](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Honeybee_Grid-based_Daylight_Simulation_Example_II&slide=0&scale=1&offset=0,0)).



it's runs comfortable.

In the result data(.res file) , There are three result .

could you tell what each data express?

replies.body: The results are irradiance values for red, blue and green for each test point. Read this thread on Radiance mailing list: [http://www.radiance-online.org:82/pipermail/radiance-general/2015-J...](http://www.radiance-online.org:82/pipermail/radiance-general/2015-June/011053.html)

Hi, Mostapha.

Thank you your reply.



When I change simulation type to radiation(wh/m2) , do the results  means red,blue and green range radiation?

when I use visualize the results(recolormesh), I think the value is same as first data.





I thank you for reading it through.
